cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level dev to cross-train on security rule design and testing.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required at this stage; capacity is sufficient.
cost_optimization: Optimize by having senior dev focus on architecture and security, mid-level on feature implementation.
future_scaling: Can handle an additional 20% workload before new resources are needed.

cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level mobile dev to gain experience in Flutter Web.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required, but a Flutter Web specialist could accelerate admin features.
cost_optimization: Current team is balanced and sufficient.
future_scaling: Can handle a 30% increase in feature work.

cross_training_opportunities: Train developers on writing better integration tests to reduce QA load.
contractor_augmentation_option: A part-time security test specialist could be engaged for critical releases.
cost_optimization: Low utilization suggests QA can support another small project or focus heavily on test automation.
future_scaling: Bottleneck risk. A second QA resource will be needed if team size grows.
